Title: Review of the status of gatekeeper
[Obligation to allow communication and marketing (steering)]
Title_FR: [Obligation d’autoriser la communication et le marketing (steering)]

Title: [Obligation to allow end users access to and use of content purchased elsewhere]
Title_FR: [Obligation de permettre aux utilisateurs finaux d’accéder aux contenus achetés ailleurs et de les utiliser]

Title: [Prohibition of tying CPS with selected additional services]
Title_FR: [Interdiction de lier un CPS à des services supplémentaires sélectionnés]
Title_DE: [Kopplungsverbot zentraler Plattformdienste mit ausgewählten weiteren Diensten]

Title: [Prohibition of tying the use of one CPS with subscription/registration with another CPS]
Title_FR: [Interdiction de lier l’utilisation d’un CPS à l’abonnement/l’inscription à un autre CPS]
Title_DE: [Kopplungsverbot zentraler Plattformdienste/Registrierung bei weiteren zentralen Plattformdiensten]

Title: Obligations for gatekeepers susceptible of being further specified under Article 8
[Interoperability of operating systems and virtual assistants]
Title_FR: [Interopérabilité des systèmes d’exploitation et des assistants virtuels]

Title: [Data access for business users]
Title_FR: [Accès aux données pour les entreprises utilisatrices]

Title: [Access to search engine data]
Title_FR: [Accès aux données des moteurs de recherche]

Title: Obligation for gatekeepers on interoperability of number-independent interpersonal communications services
Exemption for grounds of public health and public security
Market investigation into new services and new practices
Power to carry out interviews and take statements
Limitation periods for the imposition of penalties
Limitation periods for the enforcement of penalties
Right to be heard and access to the file
Cooperation and coordination with national competent authorities enforcing competition rules
Reporting of breaches and protection of reporting persons
Review by the Court of Justice
